content.question: Which of the following best explains an anthropogenic cause of the trend illustrated on the graph?

choices.label: Increased atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations from burning of fossil fuels and vehicle emissions are contributing to ocean acidification.

Increased atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations from volcanic eruptions and cellular respiration are contributing to coral bleaching.

Increased atmospheric <math alttext="N O x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>x</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations from fertilizers and livestock operations are contributing to a decrease in acid deposition in the ocean.

Increased atmospheric <math alttext="N O x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>x</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations from decomposition in landfills is contributing to eutrophication.

content.answer: Increased atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations from burning of fossil fuels and vehicle emissions are contributing to ocean acidification.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
